name: Plutonian Avenger
description:
Plutonian Avenger it´s the small quest for the sole survivor of the race to extinguish human forces and avenge his brothers and sisters, hunted and experimented with by humanity until no one was left alive

Destroy the humankind and kill the president of Ameriga and his wife, Lady Liberty in a classic top down shooter like the old ones, on exception that you now control when you advance :)
